title: FS:  Lundgren KC, Chase Pink, Rucker Throwing

posts.post_title: FS:  Lundgren KC, Chase Pink, Rucker Throwing
posts.post_content:
I'm selling some extras that I have.

Prices are PayPal FF net to me, and include all shipping charges.

Lundgren KC PSA with EPDG Back - PSA 4.5 - $Sold
Chase - Pink Background - PSA 3 - $Sold
Rucker Throwing with EPDG Back - PSA 5 - $Sold

The Chase has a couple of very small wrinkles.  The wrinkles start on the right edge and end near his right ear.  

For some reason the Chase and Rucker scans will not upload.  Please email me for scans at [url]frankbev29@yahoo.com[/url].  I'll re-scan and upload them tomorrow from a different computer.

Updated to show sale pending on Rucker and Lundgren.

Chase is still available
Just sent email inquiring about Chase pink version.
